formatName: Raw PIMA SWIR Reflectance Spectral File
formatDescription: These files store SWIR (short wave infrared) data which has been generated by a PIMA (Portable Infrared Mineral Analyser, a particular brand/type of spectrometer). They can be imported into early versions of 'The Spectral Geologist' software.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of Australia / National Library of Australia

internalSignatures.name: Raw PIMA SWIR Reflectance Spectral File
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: ISPLFOS….
